edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.inflector.pluralizer
Interface Pluralizer

All Known Subinterfaces:
Inflector
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultInflector, DefaultPluralizer, EnglishInflector, EnglishPluralizer, NoopInflector, NoopPluralizer, RuleBasedPluralizer
public interface Pluralizer

Defines an interface for finding the plural form of a noun or pronoun.

Method Summary

Method Detail

pluralize

java.lang.String pluralize(java.lang.String nounOrPronoun)
Pluralize a noun or pronoun.

Parameters:
nounOrPronoun - The singular form of the noun or pronoun.
Returns:
The plural form of the noun or pronoun.

pluralize

java.lang.String pluralize(java.lang.String nounOrPronoun,
                           int number)
Pluralize a noun or pronoun.

Parameters:
nounOrPronoun - The singular form of the noun or pronoun.
number - The number for the noun or pronoun.
Returns:
The form of the noun or pronoun for the specified number.
